> Tucson opens the passenger's side door for Perceptor, hearing that he was
> on that side. He was happy to have passengers, because to him, having his
> comrades around was a great comfort.

As Tuscon opened his door to let Talon, Perceptor and Lord Elder in,
Elder just waved Tuscon on, "No, I will need to talk Cheetor alone.
Just because he has yet to come to know Perceptor here, does not give
him leave to talk to you as he wishes is. I will pull him aside to
talk to him. I'll get back to you." Elder chuckled, "Cheetor should be
okay, Ramulus is the one that may need more time than most. He has not
been one to trust anyone."

Elder turned aside to catch up with Cheetor who was walking off to one
side, although sullen, still had a good pace. Elder was forced to jog
for a moment and lay a comforting hand on the young Maximal's shoulder
and pull him to a stop. The two began walking together at a somewhat
slower pace talking in low tones.

(TAG)

Preston
